dialogue.text: You don't need to understand everything to engage something meaningfully. Two vertical layers is enough to glimpse the trap. Three horizontal moves is enough to avoid walking into the same wall twice.

psychological_notes: The architect provides practical comfort - Evan's mapped limits (2 vertical, 3 horizontal) are actually sufficient for meaningful engagement with life. Perfect understanding isn't required for effective living. This wisdom transforms limitation from handicap to workable parameter.
philosophical_underpinning: Sufficiency over completeness, pragmatism over perfectionism
therapeutic_direction: Permission to engage life with partial understanding
